OPEN.name: Open trailer
OPEN.description: Open trailers feature an open loading floor without side or rear walls. This makes them particularly versatile for transporting large, irregular or heavy loads such as garden materials, construction waste or furniture. They are ideal for short transports in urban environments, but require extra attention for securing the load.

features.title: Features & tips:
items: Open loading bed: ideal for large and irregularly shaped objects
Weather influences: load is exposed to rain and wind
Safety: check tire pressure and lighting regularly
Driver's license: usually a B license is sufficient

general.title: General information:
items: Pay attention to the maximum permitted mass (MPM)
Distribute weight evenly and pay attention to correct ball weight
Keep extra distance while driving

featuresList: Foldable side walls for easy loading
Use a tarp in bad weather

CLOSED.name: Enclosed trailer
CLOSED.description: Enclosed trailers offer a fully shielded loading compartment that provides optimal protection against weather conditions and unwanted visibility. They are very suitable for transporting valuable, vulnerable or fragile loads such as electronics and furniture.

features.title: Features & tips:
items: Protection: sealed construction prevents damage from weather and wind
Securely lockable: often equipped with locks
Ventilation: check ventilation to prevent moisture
Height: pay attention to height restrictions in parking garages

general.title: General information:
items: Check seals and locking mechanism regularly
Ensure even weight distribution
Account for longer braking distance when fully loaded

featuresList: Ideal for valuable and fragile loads

PICKUP.name: Car transporter
PICKUP.description: Pickup trailers are specially designed for transporting vehicles and heavy loads. With integrated loading ramps and adjustable wheel stops, they ensure safe, stable loading.

features.title: Features & tips:
items: Loading ramps: easy loading of rolling cargo
Adjustable wheel stops: prevents shifting
Weight distribution: distribute evenly over axles
Brake system: braked version for heavy loads

general.title: General information:
items: Check attachment points before departure
Pay attention to correct ball weight
Longer braking distance and turning radius

featuresList: Adjustable wheel stops and sturdy loading ramps

BOAT.name: Boat trailer
BOAT.description: Boat trailers are designed for safe and easy transportation of boats. With a tilting construction, adjustable support points and an integrated winch, loading and unloading at a ramp is simple.

features.title: Features & tips:
items: Tilting frame: facilitates launching
Adjustable supports: fits different boat shapes
Integrated winch: easy loading and unloading
Corrosion resistant: rinse after salt water use

general.title: General information:
items: Check that boat dimensions and weight are within limits
Check winch cable, axles and lighting
Distribute weight in boat for stability

featuresList: Adjustable support points for different boats

MOTORCYCLE.name: Motorcycle trailer
MOTORCYCLE.description: Motorcycle trailers are compact and designed to safely transport motorcycles or scooters. With integrated wheel clamps, a non-slip floor and a low center of gravity, shocks are minimized.

features.title: Features & tips:
items: Wheel clamps: secure the front wheel for stability
Non-slip floor: prevents sliding in wet conditions
Low center of gravity: ensures stable driving behavior
Tie-down straps: use sturdy straps for fixation

general.title: General information:
items: Check that motorcycle is secure and straight
Prevent movement over bumps
Longer braking distance and wider turns

featuresList: Integral wheel clamps and non-slip floor
Low center of gravity for stability

CAR.name: Car transporter
CAR.description: Car trailers are advanced designed for safe and stable transportation of passenger cars, commercial vehicles or other vehicles. They are equipped with a hydraulic tilting system, sturdy loading ramps and multiple attachment points.

features.title: Features & tips:
items: Hydraulically tilting: facilitates loading
Sturdy loading ramps: stable loading and unloading
Securing: use tie-down points and straps
Systems: check hydraulics and brakes

general.title: General information:
items: Pay attention to total weight and maximum permitted mass
Distribute load for correct ball weight
Drive carefully, especially on descents

featuresList: Sturdy loading ramps for safe loading

FURNITURE.name: Furniture transporter
FURNITURE.description: Furniture transport trailers offer a spacious loading area specially designed for safely transporting large and heavy furniture pieces. Internal attachment points provide extra protection during transport.

features.title: Features & tips:
items: Spacious loading volume: ideal for cabinets, sofas and beds
Attachment rails: tie-down straps prevent shifting
Protection: use blankets and bubble wrap
Loading ramp: check height of loading floor

general.title: General information:
items: Even weight distribution and ball weight
Pay attention to extra height or length
Check tie-down straps and attachment points

featuresList: Spacious loading area and internal attachment points
Flexible setup for various furniture pieces

LIVESTOCK.name: Horse trailer
LIVESTOCK.description: Livestock trailers are designed with animal welfare and safety as the highest priority. They feature spacious stalls, excellent ventilation and a non-slip floor for comfort and safety.

features.title: Features & tips:
items: Spacious stalls: sufficient room for movement
Ventilation: prevent overheating
Non-slip floor: increases comfort and safety
Cleaning: maintain hygiene and health

general.title: General information:
items: Regular breaks on longer journeys
Check for damage or loose parts
Veterinary documents for cross-border transport

REFRIGERATED.name: Refrigerated trailer
REFRIGERATED.description: Refrigerated trailers are specially developed for transporting temperature-sensitive goods such as food, medicines and flowers. They feature an active cooling system and high-quality insulation.

features.title: Features & tips:
items: Active cooling system: constant temperature
High-quality insulation: limits temperature loss
Condensation management: prevent moisture and mold
Hygiene: thorough cleaning after use

general.title: General information:
items: Monitor temperature regularly during transport
Check power supply (230V or 12V)
Pay attention to shelf life and regulations

featuresList: Active cooling system and high-quality insulation

FLATBED.name: Flatbed trailer
FLATBED.description: Flatbed trailers have a completely open and flat loading surface, making them excellently suited for transporting long, heavy or irregular goods such as construction materials, pipes or wood.

features.title: Features & tips:
items: Completely flat loading floor: lots of room for movement
Few restrictions: for protruding loads
No side walls: use tie-down straps and chains
Loading ease: forklifts can easily load

general.title: General information:
items: Distribute weight evenly and pay attention to load capacity
Check securing regularly during journeys
Pay attention to wind sensitivity from flat loads

featuresList: Completely open and flat loading surface
Suitable for long and heavy objects

OTHER.name: Other
OTHER.description: Special or custom-made trailers fall outside the standard categories and are designed for unique transport needs. They may feature specific attachment systems and extra facilities.

features.title: Features & tips:
items: Custom work: each specimen can vary greatly
Specific equipment: tool boxes, hydraulics
Weight distribution: may be different
Safety: ask owner for instructions

general.title: General information:
items: Check special facilities and operation
Ensure good insurance and permits
Test first empty or lightly loaded

featuresList: Specific attachment systems and custom work
Extra facilities for unique transport needs

disselSlot.name: Hitch lock
disselSlot.description: A lock that is placed on the hitch to prevent theft.

oprijplaten.name: Loading ramps
oprijplaten.description: Ramps to drive the trailer onto for easier loading and unloading.

adapter7to13.name: 7 to 13 pin adapter
adapter7to13.description: Adapter for connecting 7-pin plug to 13-pin connection.

adapter13to7.name: 13 to 7 pin adapter
adapter13to7.description: Adapter for connecting 13-pin plug to 7-pin connection.

afdekZeil.name: Cover tarp
afdekZeil.description: Tarp to protect load against rain, wind and other weather conditions.

afdekNet.name: Cover net
afdekNet.description: Net to prevent load from falling off the trailer during transport.

pionnen.name: Traffic cones
pionnen.description: Traffic cones for marking and safety during loading/unloading.

kruiwagen.name: Wheelbarrow
kruiwagen.description: Wheelbarrow for manual transport of materials.

langeLadingBord.name: Long load sign
langeLadingBord.description: Warning sign for transports with protruding load.
